```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggrepel)
library(directlabels)
library(gapminder)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = iris, size = 12, aes(x=Sepal.Width, y = Sepal.Length, color = Species, shape = Species)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw() +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set1")+
  theme(
    axis.title.x = element_text(size = 20, color = "orange"), 
    legend.position = "bottom",
    axis.ticks.length = unit(0, "in")
  )
```

```{r}
gapminder %>% filter(continent == "Oceania") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = gdpPercap, color = country)) +
  geom_line()+
  geom_dl(mapping = aes(label = country), method = "smart.grid")+
  theme(
    legend.position = 'null'
  )
```
